name: Monsoon Wedding
summary_text: A stressed father, a bride-to-be with a secret, a smitten event planner, and relatives from around the world create much ado about the preparations for an arranged marriage in India.

name: Human Traffic
summary_text: Five friends spend one lost weekend in a mix of music, love and club culture.

name: Remember
summary_text: With the aid of a fellow Auschwitz survivor and a hand-written letter, an elderly man with dementia goes in search of the person he believes to be responsible for the death of his family in the death camp to kill him himself.

name: An American Werewolf in Paris
summary_text: An American man unwittingly gets involved with French werewolves who have developed a serum allowing them to transform at will.

name: The Ref
summary_text: A cat burglar is forced to take a bickering, dysfunctional family hostage on Christmas Eve.

name: Every Which Way but Loose
summary_text: The San Fernando Valley adventures of trucker turned prize-fighter Philo Beddoe and his pet orangutan Clyde.

name: Fierce Creatures
summary_text: Zookeepers struggle to deal with the policies of changing directors.

name: Happy Together
summary_text: A couple take a trip to Argentina but both men find their lives drifting apart in opposite directions.

name: Umberto D.
summary_text: An elderly man and his dog struggle to survive on his government pension in Rome.

name: Calendar Girls
summary_text: A Women's Institute chapter's fundraising effort for a local hospital by posing nude for a calendar becomes a media sensation.

name: The Hunger
summary_text: A love triangle develops between a beautiful yet dangerous vampire, her cellist companion, and a gerontologist.

name: The Accidental Husband
summary_text: When talk radio host Emma Lloyd advises one of her listeners to break up with her boyfriend, the jilted ex sets about getting his revenge.

name: Love & Friendship
summary_text: Lady Susan Vernon takes up temporary residence at her in-laws' estate and, while there, is determined to be a matchmaker for her daughter Frederica -- and herself too, naturally.

name: Her Sey Çok Güzel Olacak
summary_text: When Altan swipes prescription drugs from his brother Nuri's pharmacy, they soon find themselves on a dangerous but funny road trip to get rid of the stuff and escape the mafiosi Altan ...                See full summary »

name: Heaven
summary_text: A woman takes the law into her own hands after police ignore her pleas to arrest the man responsible for her husband's death, and finds herself not only under arrest for murder but falling in love with an officer.

name: Second Act
summary_text: A big box store worker reinvents her life and her life-story and shows Madison Avenue what street smarts can do.

name: The Pyramid
summary_text: An archaeological team attempts to unlock the secrets of a lost pyramid only to find themselves hunted by an insidious creature.

name: The Prom
summary_text: A troupe of hilariously self-obsessed theater stars swarm into a small conservative Indiana town in support of a high school girl who wants to take her girlfriend to the prom.

name: Fast Food Nation
summary_text: An ensemble piece examining the health risks involved in the fast food industry and its environmental and social consequences as well.

name: Life or Something Like It
summary_text: A reporter interviews a psychic, who tells her that she's going to die and her life is meaningless.

name: The Princess Switch
summary_text: Competing in a Christmas baking competition in Belgravia, a Chicago baker bumps into the prince's fiancée--who looks just like her. They switch lives for two days.

name: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
summary_text: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

name: The Way He Looks
summary_text: Leonardo is a blind teenager searching for independence. His everyday life, the relationship with his best friend, Giovana, and the way he sees the world change completely with the arrival of Gabriel.

name: From Beyond
summary_text: A group of scientists have developed the Resonator, a machine which allows whoever is within range to see beyond normal perceptible reality. But when the experiment succeeds, they are immediately attacked by terrible life forms.

name: Walkabout
summary_text: Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.

name: Shopgirl
summary_text: A film adaptation of Steve Martin's novel about a complex love triangle between a bored salesgirl, a wealthy businessman and an aimless young man.

name: Train to Busan Presents: Peninsula
summary_text: A zombie virus has in the last 4 years spread to all South Korea. 4 Koreans in HK sail thru the blockade to Incheon for USD20,000,000 on a truck.

name: Dogman
summary_text: A timid dog groomer living in a poor suburb sells cocaine on the side and stays out of trouble, while trying to deal with his unstable, violent acquaintance who is a menace to the whole neighborhood.

name: Grave Encounters 2
summary_text: A film student who is obsessed with the movie Grave Encounters sets out with his friends to visit the psychiatric hospital depicted in the original film.

name: Barefoot
summary_text: The "black sheep" son of a wealthy family meets a young psychiatric patient who's been raised in isolation her entire life. He then takes the naive young woman home for his brother's wedding.

name: Alphaville
summary_text: A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler.

name: Through a Glass Darkly
summary_text: Recently released from a mental hospital, Karin rejoins her emotionally disconnected family in their island home, only to slip from reality as she begins to believe she is being visited by God.

name: Mildred Pierce
summary_text: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

name: Eagle vs Shark
summary_text: The tale of two socially-awkward misfits and the strange ways they try to find love: through revenge on high-school bullies, burgers, and video games.

name: Getaway
summary_text: To save his kidnapped wife, Brent Magna must drive at the orders of a mysterious man.

name: American Mary
summary_text: The allure of easy money sends Mary Mason, a medical student, into the world of underground surgeries which ends up leaving more marks on her than her so-called "freakish" clients.

name: Spy Kids 4: All the Time in the World
summary_text: A retired spy is called back into action, and to bond with her new step-children, she invites them along for the adventure to stop the evil Timekeeper from taking over the world.

name: A Fantastic Woman
summary_text: Marina, a transgender woman who works as a waitress and moonlights as a nightclub singer, is bowled over by the death of her older boyfriend.

name: Surviving Christmas
summary_text: A lonely, obnoxious young millionaire pays a family to spend Christmas with him.

name: Kazaam
summary_text: A troubled kid inadvertently releases a genie, who must grant him any three wishes he requests.

name: The Thomas Crown Affair
summary_text: A debonair, adventuresome bank executive believes he has pulled off the perfect multi-million dollar heist, only to match wits with a sexy insurance investigator who will do anything to get her man.

name: Malice
summary_text: A tale about a happily married couple who would like to have children. Tracy teaches art, Andy's a college dean. Things are never the same after she is taken to hospital and operated upon by Jed, a "know all" doctor.

name: The Ice Harvest
summary_text: A shady lawyer attempts a Christmas Eve crime, hoping to swindle the local mob out of some money. But his partner, a strip club owner, might have different plans for the cash.

name: Rampart
summary_text: Set in 1999 Los Angeles, veteran police officer Dave Brown, the last of the renegade cops, works to take care of his family, and struggles for his own survival.

name: Last Flag Flying
summary_text: Thirty years after they served together in Vietnam, a former Navy Corpsman Larry "Doc" Shepherd re-unites with his old buddies, former Marines Sal Nealon and Reverend Richard Mueller, to bury his son, a young Marine killed in the Iraq War.

name: Drishyam 2
summary_text: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

name: Flawless
summary_text: In 1960s London, an elderly janitor convinces a glass-ceiling constrained executive to help him steal a handful of diamonds from their employer, the London Diamond Corporation.

name: Stowaway
summary_text: A three-person crew on a mission to Mars faces an impossible choice when an unplanned passenger jeopardizes the lives of everyone on board.

name: Badla
summary_text: A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened.

name: Needful Things
summary_text: A mysterious new shop opens in a small town which always seems to stock the deepest desires of each shopper, with a price far heavier than expected.

name: Three Men and a Little Lady
summary_text: Three ex-dads quickly discover how empty life is without their little lady, and go to outrageous lengths in their efforts to win their daughter back in this critically acclaimed and equally charming sequel.

name: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
summary_text: After a freak accident, a company executive turns completely invisible, goes on the run and becomes hunted by a treacherous CIA official, whilst trying to cope with his new reality.

name: Red Cliff II
summary_text: Second and final part of epic tale about a legendary battle that changed the course of China history.

name: Death and the Maiden
summary_text: A political activist is convinced that her guest is a man who once tortured her for the government.

name: Dead Snow 2: Red vs. Dead
summary_text: Still on the run from a group of Nazi zombies, a man seeks the aid of a group of American zombie enthusiasts, and discovers new techniques for fighting the zombies.

name: Band of Outsiders
summary_text: Two crooks with a fondness for old Hollywood B-movies convince a languages student to help them commit a robbery.

name: Street Fighter: The Legend of Chun-Li
summary_text: When a teenager, Chun-Li witnesses the kidnapping of her father by wealthy crime lord M. Bison. When she grows up, she goes into a quest for vengeance and becomes the famous crime-fighter of the Street Fighter universe.

name: Get on Up
summary_text: A chronicle of James Brown's rise from extreme poverty to become one of the most influential musicians in history.

name: Cat's Eye
summary_text: A stray cat is the linking element of three tales of suspense and horror.

name: Palmer
summary_text: An ex-convict strikes up a friendship with a boy from a troubled home.

name: The Contender
summary_text: Senator Laine Hanson is a contender for U.S. Vice President, but information and disinformation about her past surfaces that threatens to derail her confirmation.

name: Madras Cafe
summary_text: An Indian intelligence agent journeys to a war-torn coastal island to break a resolute rebel group and meets a passionate journalist.

name: The Swan Princess
summary_text: A power-hungry sorcerer curses a princess to live as a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.

name: Lifeforce
summary_text: A race of space vampires arrives in London and infects the populace, beginning an apocalyptic descent into chaos.

name: The Birth of a Nation
summary_text: The Stoneman family finds its friendship with the Camerons affected by the Civil War, both fighting in opposite armies. The development of the war in their lives plays through to Lincoln's assassination and the birth of the Ku Klux Klan.

name: Jessabelle
summary_text: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, Jessabelle comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has been seeking her return -- and has no intention of letting her escape.

name: I'm a Cyborg, But That's OK
summary_text: A girl who thinks she is a combat cyborg checks into a mental hospital, where she encounters other psychotics. Eventually, she falls for a man who thinks he can steal people's souls.

name: Klute
summary_text: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

name: Prizzi's Honor
summary_text: Two professional assassins fall in love.

name: Puncture
summary_text: A David and Goliath law drama about a drug-addicted lawyer who takes on a health supply corporation while battling his own personal demons.

name: Jungle 2 Jungle
summary_text: A man learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who was raised in the jungle and brings the boy to New York City, turning his life upside down in the process.

name: Man of the House
summary_text: A Texas Ranger must protect a group of cheerleaders who have witnessed a murder.

name: The Nightingale
summary_text: Set in 1825, Clare, a young Irish convict woman, chases a British officer through the rugged Tasmanian wilderness, bent on revenge for a terrible act of violence he committed against her family. On the way she enlists the services of an Aboriginal tracker named Billy, who is also marked by trauma from his own violence-filled past.

name: Men at Work
summary_text: Two garbage men uncover a conspiracy involving illegal toxic waste dumping and decide to bring the whole operation down.

name: Beverly Hills Chihuahua
summary_text: While on vacation in Mexico, Chloe, a ritzy Beverly Hills chihuahua, finds herself lost and in need of assistance in order to get back home.

name: Under Suspicion
summary_text: A wealthy attorney in San Juan comes to the police station for "10 minutes" of follow-up questions to finding a 12-year-old girl's body in a park. Another young girl was also raped and murdered weeks earlier and the evidence points to him.

name: Don't Worry, He Won't Get Far on Foot
summary_text: On the rocky path to sobriety after a life-changing accident, John Callahan discovers the healing power of art, willing his injured hands into drawing hilarious, often controversial cartoons, which bring him a new lease on life.

name: The Lego Ninjago Movie
summary_text: Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a teenager seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas.

name: The Magnificent Ambersons
summary_text: The spoiled young heir to the decaying Amberson fortune comes between his widowed mother and the man she has always loved.

name: ATM
summary_text: On a late night visit to an ATM, three co-workers end up in a desperate fight for their lives when they become trapped by an unknown man.

name: Creepshow 2
summary_text: Three more bone-chilling tales that include a vengeful wooden Native American, a monstrous blob in a lake, and a hitchhiker who wants revenge and will not die.

name: HouseSitter
summary_text: Con artist Gwen moves into Newton's empty home without his knowledge and begins setting up house, posing as his new wife.

name: Le Cercle Rouge
summary_text: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

name: Rollerball
summary_text: In a corporate-controlled future, an ultra-violent sport known as Rollerball represents the world, and one of its powerful athletes is out to defy those who want him out of the game.

name: Beautiful Thing
summary_text: Jamie is a shy teenager, often bullied at school. His neighbour Ste has a rough time at home, being beaten by his father and brother. This issues bring them together and they find that what they feel for each other is more than friendship.

name: About Last Night
summary_text: Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.

name: Knockaround Guys
summary_text: The wannabe sons of mobsters go to a remote town in the Midwest, and get themselves into more trouble than anyone could anticipate.

name: Sniper
summary_text: A US Marine sniper is partnered with a SWAT member to take out rebel leaders in the jungles of Panama.

When terrorists try to seize control of a Berlin-Paris flight, a soft-spoken American co-pilot struggles to save the lives of the passengers and crew while forging a surprising connection with one of the hijackers.

name: Nothing to Lose
summary_text: Self-financed fictional biopic of Brazilian bishop Edir Macedo, founder of the Universal Church of the Kingdom of God and owner of Record TV network.

name: Nothing But Trouble
summary_text: A businessman and his friends are captured by a sadistic judge and his equally odd family in the backwoods of a bizarre mansion.

name: Color of Night
summary_text: A color-blind psychiatrist Bill Capa is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that Capa begins having intense sexual encounters with.

name: Trapped
summary_text: The Jennings' fight for their daughters life after she is kidnapped by an experienced gang of thieves.

name: Berlin Syndrome
summary_text: A passionate holiday romance leads to an obsessive relationship, when an Australian photojournalist wakes one morning in a Berlin apartment and is unable to leave.

name: Prospect
summary_text: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote alien moon, aiming to strike it rich. They've secured a contract to harvest a large deposit of the elusive gems hidden in the depths of the moon's toxic forest. But there are others roving the wilderness and the job quickly devolves into a fight to survive. Forced to contend not only with the forest's other ruthless inhabitants, but with her own ...                See full summary »

name: Missing Link
summary_text: Mr. Link recruits explorer Sir Lionel Frost to help find his long-lost relatives in the fabled valley of Shangri-La. Along with adventurer Adelina Fortnight, this trio of explorers travel the world to help their new friend.

name: Gabbar is Back
summary_text: A grief-stricken man takes the law into his own hands when he begins to kidnap and murder corrupt public servants.

name: The Way We Were
summary_text: Two disparate people have a wonderful romance, but their political views and convictions drive them apart.

name: Little Manhattan
summary_text: A 10-year-old boy and an 11-year-old girl find love in New York City.

name: Legionnaire
summary_text: Alain is a boxer in 1925 Marseille, France. When he doesn't take the dive paid to take by a mob boss, he has to split. He joins the Foreign Legion and is sent to Morocco. He makes 3 friends and they watch each other's backs.

name: Boy
summary_text: Set on the east coast of New Zealand in 1984, Boy, an 11-year-old child and devout Michael Jackson fan, gets a chance to know his absentee criminal father, who has returned to find a bag of money he buried years ago.

name: Green Card
summary_text: A man wanting to stay in the US enters into a marriage of convenience, but it turns into more than that.

name: Cyrano de Bergerac
summary_text: Famed swordsman and poet Cyrano de Bergerac is in love with his cousin Roxane. He has never expressed his love for her as he his large nose undermines his self-confidence. Then he finds a way to express his love to her, indirectly.
The epic tale of a class struggle in twentieth century Italy, as seen through the eyes of two childhood friends on opposing sides.

name: The United States of Leland
summary_text: A young man's experience in a juvenile detention center that touches on the tumultuous changes that befall his family and the community in which he lives.

name: Reservation Road
summary_text: The lives of two families change forever after a fatal tragedy takes place on Reservation Road.

name: Elevator to the Gallows
summary_text: A self-assured businessman murders his employer, the husband of his mistress, which unintentionally provokes an ill-fated chain of events.

name: Good Kill
summary_text: A family man begins to question the ethics of his job as a drone pilot.

name: Crossing Over
summary_text: Crossing Over is about illegal aliens of many nationalities in the Los Angeles area and the authorities and individuals dealing with them.

name: Pete's Dragon
summary_text: An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to town with his abusive adoptive parents in pursuit.

name: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
summary_text: With the help of an irreverent young sidekick, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organize a daring new heist.

name: Christiane F.
summary_text: A teen girl in 1970's Berlin becomes addicted to heroin. Everything in her life slowly begins to distort and disappear as she befriends a small crew of junkies and falls in love with a drug-abusing male prostitute.

name: The Wizard of Lies
summary_text: The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history.

name: Winter Light
summary_text: A small-town priest struggles with his faith.

name: Free Birds
summary_text: Two turkeys from opposite sides of the tracks must put aside their differences and team up to travel back in time to change the course of history, and get Turkeys off the Thanksgiving menu for good.

name: Ölümlü Dünya
summary_text: Mermer Family lives a double life working at their family owned restaurant while being undercover assassins for an international organization. After their secret is revealed, this dysfunctional family needs to work together to survive.

name: Angel Eyes
summary_text: A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and a unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems.

name: Impostor
summary_text: In the future, an alien race uses androids as bombs to attack Earth. A government weapons specialist is accused of being one such android and sets out to prove his innocence.

name: Dolphin Tale
summary_text: A story centered on the friendship between a boy and a dolphin whose tail was lost in a crab trap.

name: Manderlay
summary_text: A story of slavery, set in the southern U.S. in the 1930s.

name: Miracles from Heaven
summary_text: Based on the incredible true story of the Beam family.

name: Viridiana
summary_text: Viridiana, a young nun about to take her final vows, pays a visit to her widowed uncle at the request of her Mother Superior.

name: Hausu
summary_text: A schoolgirl and six of her classmates travel to her aunt's country home, which turns out to be haunted.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
summary_text: School's out. Summer vacation is on. However, Greg may not have the best summer vacation ever. What could go wrong?

name: Love in the Time of Cholera
summary_text: Florentino, rejected by the beautiful Fermina at a young age, devotes much of his adult life to carnal affairs as a desperate attempt to heal his broken heart.

name: The Outpost
summary_text: A small team of U.S. soldiers battle against hundreds of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan.

name: Agneepath
summary_text: A young boy's father is lynched before his eyes; fifteen years later he returns home for revenge.

name: The Master of Disguise
summary_text: An Italian waiter fights off a criminal mastermind with his inherited powers of disguise.

name: Dark Star
summary_text: In the far reaches of space, a small crew, 20 years into their solitary mission, find things beginning to go hilariously wrong.

name: Ricki and the Flash
summary_text: A musician who gave up everything for her dream of rock-and-roll stardom returns home, looking to make things right with her family.

name: Aftermath
summary_text: Two strangers' lives become inextricably bound together after a devastating plane crash.

name: Captivity
summary_text: A man and a woman awaken to find themselves trapped in a cellar. As their kidnapper drives them mad, the truth about their horrific abduction is revealed.

name: Room in Rome
summary_text: A hotel room in the center of Rome serves as the setting for two young and recently acquainted women to have a physical adventure that touches their very souls.

name: The Tin Drum
summary_text: In 1924, Oskar Matzerath is born in the Free City of Danzig. At age three, he falls down a flight of stairs and stops growing. In 1939, World War II breaks out.

name: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
summary_text: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

name: Jolly LLB 2
summary_text: Jolly is a clumsy lawyer who is faced with representing the most critical court case of his career.

name: The Twilight Samurai
summary_text: As the feudal Japan era draws to a close, a widower samurai experiences difficulty balancing clan loyalties, 2 young daughters, an aged mother, and the sudden reappearance of his childhood sweetheart.

name: A Woman Under the Influence
summary_text: Although wife and mother Mabel is loved by her husband Nick, her mental illness places a strain on the marriage.

name: The Hole
summary_text: A pair of brothers stumble upon a mysterious hole in their basement that leads to the darkest corridors of their fears and nightmares.

name: The Shootist
summary_text: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

name: School Ties
summary_text: Set in the 1950s, a star-quarterback is given an opportunity to attend an elite preparatory school but must conceal the fact that he is Jewish.

name: Igor
summary_text: Animated fable about a cliché hunchbacked evil scientist's assistant who aspires to become a scientist himself, much to the displeasure of the rest of the evil science community.

name: London
summary_text: London is a drug laden adventure that centers on a party in a New York loft where a young man is trying to win back his ex-girlfriend.

name: On Deadly Ground
summary_text: A mystical martial artist/environmental Agent takes on a ruthless oil corporation.

name: The Last Detail
summary_text: Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.

name: Bodyguard
summary_text: The daughter of a wealthy nobleman secretly falls in love with her bodyguard.

name: Fist of Legend
summary_text: In 1937, a Chinese martial artist returns to Shanghai to find his teacher dead and his school harassed by the Japanese.

name: The Angry Birds Movie 2
summary_text: The flightless birds and scheming green pigs take their feud to the next level.

name: Like Father, Like Son
summary_text: Ryota is a successful workaholic businessman. When he learns that his biological son was switched with another boy after birth, he faces the difficult decision to choose his true son or the boy he and his wife have raised as their own.

name: Paradise Now
summary_text: Two childhood friends are recruited for a suicide bombing in Tel Aviv.

name: If....
summary_text: In this allegorical story, a revolution led by pupil Mick Travis takes place at an old established private school in England.

name: Khosla Ka Ghosla!
summary_text: A Delhi based retired middle class man tries half-heartedly to get his land back from a swindling property dealer with the help of his sons and their friends.

name: My Life as a Zucchini
summary_text: After losing his mother, a young boy is sent to a foster home with other orphans his age where he begins to learn the meaning of trust and true love.

name: Black Narcissus
summary_text: A group of nuns struggle to establish a convent in the Himalayas, while isolation, extreme weather, altitude, and culture clashes all conspire to drive the well-intentioned missionaries mad.

name: I'm So Excited!
summary_text: When it appears as though the end is in sight, the pilots, flight crew, and passengers of a plane heading to Mexico City look to forget the anguish of the moment and face the greatest danger, which we carry within ourselves.

name: Possessor
summary_text: Possessor follows an agent who works for a secretive organization that uses brain-implant technology to inhabit other people's bodies - ultimately driving them to commit assassinations for high-paying clients.

name: Winnie the Pooh
summary_text: While searching for honey, Pooh and his friends embark on an adventure to find Eeyore's missing tail and rescue Christopher Robin from an unknown monster called The Backson.

name: Bacurau
summary_text: After the death of her grandmother, Teresa comes home to her matriarchal village in a near-future Brazil to find a succession of sinister events that mobilizes all of its residents.

name: Fire in the Sky
summary_text: An Arizona logger mysteriously disappears for five days in an alleged encounter with a flying saucer in 1975. His co-workers endure ridicule and contempt as they are wrongly accused of murder.

name: Mirrormask
summary_text: In a fantasy world of opposing kingdoms, a fifteen-year-old girl must find the fabled MirrorMask in order to save the kingdom and get home.

name: One Eight Seven
summary_text: 15 months after being stabbed 9 times by a student at work as a high school teacher in NYC, Mr. Garfield is working in LA as a substitute teacher come full-time. He refuses to be a victim anymore.

name: Get Low
summary_text: A movie spun out of equal parts folk tale, fable and real-life legend about the mysterious, 1930s Tennessee hermit who famously threw his own rollicking funeral party... while he was still alive.

name: Rundskop
summary_text: Sint-Truiden, Belgium. Jacky, a young cattle farmer who is constantly pumped on steroids and hormones, is approached by a veterinarian to make a deal with a notorious beef trader.

name: Great Expectations
summary_text: A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.

name: Postal
summary_text: In the ironically named city of Paradise, a loser teams up with his cult-leading uncle to steal a peculiar bounty of riches from their local amusement park. The recently arrived Taliban have a similar focus, but a far more sinister intent.

name: Laws of Attraction
summary_text: Amidst a sea of litigation, two New York City divorce lawyers find love.

name: All the Bright Places
summary_text: The story of Violet and Theodore, who meet and change each other's lives forever. As they struggle with the emotional and physical scars of their past, they discover that even the smallest places and moments can mean something.

name: Tiger Zinda Hai
summary_text: When a group of Indian and Pakistani nurses are held hostage in Iraq by a terrorist organization, a secret agent is drawn out of hiding to rescue them.

name: Mansfield Park
summary_text: Fanny, born into a poor family, is sent away to live with wealthy uncle Sir Thomas, his wife and their four children, where she'll be brought up for a proper introduction to society.

name: Smart People
summary_text: Into the life of a widowed professor comes a new love and an unexpected visit from his adopted brother.

name: Catch-22
summary_text: A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.

name: Van Wilder 2: The Rise of Taj
summary_text: Taj Mahal Badalandabad leaves Coolidge College behind for the halls of Camford University in England, where he looks to continue his education, and teach an uptight student how to make the most out of her academic career.

name: Darr
summary_text: A woman plans to marry a navy officer but she is also the object of another man's obsession.

name: Pink Flamingos
summary_text: Notorious Baltimore criminal and underground figure Divine goes up against a sleazy married couple who make a passionate attempt to humiliate her and seize her tabloid-given title as "The Filthiest Person Alive".

name: Haunt
summary_text: On Halloween, a group of friends encounter an "extreme" haunted house that promises to feed on their darkest fears. The night turns deadly as they come to the horrifying realization that some nightmares are real.

name: The Man Without a Past
summary_text: M arrives in Helsinki only to be viciously attacked by thugs and pronounced dead by medics. He revives but with no memory of his past or his identity. He rebuilds his life from scratch, but the past inevitably catches up with him.

name: The Kissing Booth 2
summary_text: In the sequel to 2018's THE KISSING BOOTH, high school senior Elle juggles a long-distance relationship with her dreamy boyfriend Noah, college applications, and a new friendship with a handsome classmate that could change everything.

name: The Importance of Being Earnest
summary_text: In 1890s London, two friends use the same pseudonym ("Ernest") for their on-the-sly activities. Hilarity ensues.

name: The Serpent and the Rainbow
summary_text: An anthropologist goes to Haiti after hearing rumors about a drug used by black magic practitioners to turn people into zombies.

name: The Woman
summary_text: When a successful country lawyer captures and attempts to "civilize" the last remaining member of a violent clan that has roamed the Northeast coast for decades, he puts the lives of his family in jeopardy.

name: A Moment to Remember
summary_text: A young couple's enduring love is tested when 27-year-old Su-jin is diagnosed with a rare form of Alzheimer's disease.

name: Clown
summary_text: A loving father finds a clown suit for his son's birthday party, only to realize that it's cursed.

name: Exorcist II: The Heretic
summary_text: A teenage girl once possessed by a demon finds that it still lurks within her. Meanwhile, a priest investigates the death of the girl's exorcist.

name: King of California
summary_text: An unstable dad who after getting out of a mental institution tries to convince his daughter that there's Spanish gold buried somewhere under suburbia.

name: Princess Protection Program
summary_text: A princess whose country has been invaded goes into hiding in Louisiana, where she has to learn to act like an ordinary teenager.

name: Starter for 10
summary_text: Set in 1985, working-class student Brian Jackson (McAvoy) navigates his first year at Bristol University.

name: Little Boy
summary_text: An eight-year-old boy is willing to do whatever it takes to end World War II so he can bring his father home. The story reveals the indescribable love a father has for his little boy and the love a son has for his father.

name: Junebug
summary_text: A dealer in "outsider" art travels from Chicago to North Carolina to meet her new in-laws, challenging the equilibrium of this middle class Southern home.

name: Guru
summary_text: A villager, Gurukant Desai, arrives in Bombay 1958, and rises from its streets to become the GURU, the biggest tycoon in Indian history.

name: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
summary_text: An NRI and his wife decide to stay in his ancestral home, paying no heed to the warnings about ghosts. Soon, inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to help solve the mystery.

name: The Bye Bye Man
summary_text: Three friends stumble upon the horrific origins of a mysterious figure they discover is the root cause of the evil behind unspeakable acts.

name: Love the Coopers
summary_text: The intertwined stories of four generations of Coopers unfold right before the annual family reunion on Christmas Eve. Can they survive the most beautiful time of the year?

name: Battlestar Galactica: Razor
summary_text: A two-hour Battlestar Galactica special that tells the story of the Battlestar Pegasus several months prior to it finding the Galactica.

name: Kaybedenler Kulübü
summary_text: Kaan and Mete, co-hosts of a mid 1990s radio show called Kaybedenler Kulübü (Losers' Club), struggle to deal with their daily lives after their show becomes an instant hit. Kaan meets ...                See full summary »

name: The Astronaut Farmer
summary_text: A NASA astronaut, forced to retire years earlier so he could save his family farm, has never given up his dream of space travel and looks to build his own rocket, despite the government's threats to stop him.

name: Bang Bang
summary_text: A young bank receptionist gets mixed up with Rajveer Nanda, a man who has a mysterious background.

name: New York Minute
summary_text: Jane and Roxy Ryan are teenage Long Island twins who find themselves on numerous misadventures when they trek into Manhattan on a school day.

name: Loft
summary_text: Five close friends, all of them married, share a loft to meet their mistresses. One day they find the body of a young woman in the loft. Since there are only five keys to the loft, the five men begin to suspect each other of murder.

name: The Night Comes for Us
summary_text: Ito, a gangland enforcer, caught amidst a treacherous and violent insurrection within his Triad crime family upon his return home from a stint abroad.

name: Vampire in Brooklyn
summary_text: A ship docks in Brooklyn with all its crew dead, but someone gets off and the killing continues on land. A Caribbean vampire is searching for a specific woman, half-human half-vampire. Rita is the detective investigating the many killings.

name: The Spanish Prisoner
summary_text: An employee of a corporation with a lucrative secret process is tempted to betray it. But there's more to it than that.

name: Hababam Sinifi Sinifta Kaldi
summary_text: A young and beautiful female teacher starts working in an all boys high school.

name: Local Hero
summary_text: An American oil company has plans for a new refinery and sends someone to Scotland to buy up an entire village, but things don't go as expected.

name: Dave Chappelle: Sticks & Stones
summary_text: Dave Chappelle takes on gun culture, the opioid crisis, and the tidal wave of celebrity scandals in a defiant stand-up special filmed in Atlanta.

name: In the Cut
summary_text: New York City writing professor, Frannie Avery, has an affair with a police detective who is investigating the murder of a beautiful young woman in her neighborhood.

name: The Fabulous Baker Boys
summary_text: The lives of two struggling musicians, who happen to be brothers, inevitably change when they team up with a beautiful, up-and-coming singer.

name: Afflicted
summary_text: Two best friends see their trip of a lifetime take a dark turn when one of them is struck by a mysterious affliction. Now, in a foreign land, they race to uncover the source before it consumes him completely.

name: Jexi
summary_text: Phil makes top 10 pop lists at work. His only "friend" is cellphone Siri. His new phone includes AI helper Jexi, who improves/controls his social life.

name: American Gigolo
summary_text: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

name: Brother
summary_text: A Japanese gangster is exiled to Los Angeles where his brother lives with a small but respectable multi-racial gang, who he inspires to expand their influence.

name: Muppet Treasure Island
summary_text: The Muppets' twist on the classic tale.

name: Wind Chill
summary_text: Two college students share a ride home for the holidays, but when they break down on a deserted stretch of road, they are preyed upon by the ghosts of people who have died there.

name: Behind the Mask: The Rise of Leslie Vernon
summary_text: The next great psycho horror slasher has given a documentary crew exclusive access to his life as he plans his reign of terror over the sleepy town of Glen Echo.

name: Badlapur
summary_text: After his wife and son are killed, a young man finds out the man behind the murder and fights against him, along committing some big mistakes.

name: The Lovebirds
summary_text: A couple (Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani) experiences a defining moment in their relationship when they are unintentionally embroiled in a murder mystery.

name: A Prairie Home Companion
summary_text: A look at what goes on backstage during the last broadcast of America's most celebrated radio show, where singing cowboys Dusty and Lefty, a country music siren, and a host of others hold court.

name: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
summary_text: In this live-action prequel to The Flintstones (1994), the Flintstones and the Rubbles go on a trip to Rock Vegas, where Wilma Slaghoople is pursued by playboy Chip Rockefeller.

name: New in Town
summary_text: A Miami, Florida businesswoman adjusts to her new life in a small Minnesota town.

name: Marty
summary_text: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

name: He Was a Quiet Man
summary_text: A disenfranchised office worker becomes a hero after saving a girl's life.

name: Nowhere to Run
summary_text: Sam, an escaped convict, lands up on a farmland owned by a widow. When he learns that a ruthless contractor is trying to take over her land, he helps her to fight against the injustice.

name: Passion
summary_text: The rivalry between the manipulative boss of an advertising agency and her talented protégée escalates from stealing credit to public humiliation to murder.

name: Hotel for Dogs
summary_text: Two kids secretly take in stray dogs at a vacant hotel.

name: Megan Leavey
summary_text: Based on the true life story of a young Marine corporal whose unique discipline and bond with her military combat dog saved many lives during their deployment in Iraq.

name: Josie and the Pussycats
summary_text: A girl group find themselves in the middle of a conspiracy to deliver subliminal messages through popular music.

name: Running with Scissors
summary_text: Young Augusten Burroughs absorbs experiences that could make for a shocking memoir: the son of an alcoholic father and an unstable mother, he's handed off to his mother's therapist, Dr. Finch, and spends his adolescent years as a member of Finch's bizarre extended family.

name: Swimming with Sharks
summary_text: A young, naive Hollywood studio assistant finally turns the tables on his incredibly abusive producer boss.

name: Close
summary_text: A female bodyguard is hired to protect an heiress on the run from assassins.

name: The Punisher
summary_text: When Frank Castle's family is murdered by criminals, he wages war on crime as a vigilante assassin known only as The Punisher.

name: Silent House
summary_text: A girl is trapped inside her family's lakeside retreat and becomes unable to contact the outside world as supernatural forces haunt the house with mysterious energy and consequences.

name: Tales from the Crypt: Demon Knight
summary_text: A man on the run is hunted by a demon known as the Collector.

name: Mosul
summary_text: A police unit from Mosul fight to liberate the Iraqi city from thousands of ISIS militants.

name: Pad Man
summary_text: Upon realizing the extent to which women are affected by their menses, a man sets out to create a sanitary pad machine and to provide inexpensive sanitary pads to the women of rural India.

name: Elegy
summary_text: Cultural critic David Kepesh finds his life, which he indicates is a state of "emancipated manhood", thrown into tragic disarray by Consuela Castillo, a well-mannered student who awakens a sense of sexual possessiveness in her teacher.

name: The Bonfire of the Vanities
summary_text: After his mistress runs over a young teen, a Wall Street hotshot sees his life unravel in the spotlight and attracting the interest of a down and out reporter.

name: Breaking Away
summary_text: A small-town boy obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl.

name: Anna
summary_text: A man with the ability to enter people's memories takes on the case of a brilliant, troubled sixteen-year-old girl to determine whether she is a sociopath or a victim of trauma.

name: Soul Plane
summary_text: Things get raucously funny aboard the maiden flight of a black-owned airline, thanks to some last-minute passenger additions.

name: The Riot Club
summary_text: Two first-year students at Oxford University join the infamous Riot Club, where reputations can be made or destroyed over the course of a single evening.

name: The Current War
summary_text: The dramatic story of the cutthroat race between electricity titans Thomas A. Edison and George Westinghouse to determine whose electrical system would power the modern world.

name: We're No Angels
summary_text: Two escaped cons only prayer to escape is to pass themselves off as priests and pass by the police blockade at the border into the safety of Canada.

name: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
summary_text: A rich brat and a poor chap try to woo a girl, with their rivalry culminating in the most prestigious college event - the marathon cycle race.

name: The 12th Man
summary_text: They were 12 saboteurs. The Nazis killed 11 of them. This is the true story of the one that got away.

name: Get a Job
summary_text: After college, Will is having problems getting a good, lasting job, as are his roomies, his girlfriend and his just fired dad.

name: Tosun Pasa
summary_text: Late 19th century in Alexandria. Two traditionally rival Turkish families, "Seferoglu"s and "Tellioglu"s are competing for the "Green Valley". The winner will be determined by Daver Bey, ...                See full summary »

name: The Passenger
summary_text: A frustrated war correspondent, unable to find the war he's been asked to cover, takes the risky path of coopting the identity of a dead arms dealer acquaintance.

name: Breaking and Entering
summary_text: A landscape architect's dealings with a young thief cause him to re-evaluate his life.

name: Last Days
summary_text: A Seattle musician's life and career are reminiscent to those of Kurt Cobain.

name: Eight Crazy Nights
summary_text: Davey Stone, an alcoholic with a criminal record, is sentenced to community service under the supervision of an elderly referee. Davey is then faced with trying to reform and abandon his bad habits.

name: The Postman Always Rings Twice
summary_text: The sensuous wife of a lunch wagon proprietor and a rootless drifter begin a sordidly steamy affair and conspire to murder her Greek husband.
